text:
White House coronavirus vaccine advisor Moncef Slaoui divested his $12M worth of Moderna stock effective this morning, per an HHS spokesperson.

Fortuitous timing -- that's AFTER the stock spiked 20% over its vaccine hype but BEFORE it fell 10% today. https://t.co/EOSn89OizZ

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice
